entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , East Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: East Point 09:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 2.3°C
Wind: SSW 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this morning. Clearing near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Snow or ice pellets in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
